Articles.Content:
> 
> At this time, I could use all the help we can get...and I believe that even Xannari deserves a chance to make up for her mistakes.

Have her hack the alien AI!

Everyone get behind me! **Deploys 011 defense perimeter [i might exaggerate: Briefly]**

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-13T19:28:08Z" title="07/13/2015 07:28  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 13, 2015</time> by Xannari Ferrows**
There's a Kinemetic missile incoming!
bringing station Quantum shields online, phase varience 56 degrees, power 75%

Missile hits bay doors of the Citadel

- - - Updated - - -

The shields are keeping the air in, but life support is crippled.

[Which is rebounded]

[There's a mean storm here, so I might have to leave later]

Computer, activate operation Sentience!

- - - Updated - - -

[Everyone beams aboard Discovery, and it sets course for the Great Attractor]
and one space suit...All of you, get in the shuttle, it still has life support functioning... I'll take the suit and see what I can do to get the station's life support up.

Operation Sentience will bring everyone to the Great Attractor to enter the Multiverse and become omnipotent

- - - Updated - - -

We have port engine failure! Abort! Abort!

> 
> and one space suit...All of you, get in the shuttle, it still has life support functioning... I'll take the suit and see what I can do to get the station's life support up.

Let me go with you! I know a way around this ship, and I have a few tools that may be useful.

Discovery re-docks to the Citadel

I'm gonna use the Discovery to power the Citadel's life support.

> 
> Operation Sentience will bring everyone to the Great Attractor to enter the Multiverse and become omnipotent
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> We have port engine failure! Abort! Abort!

Negative, Not while I still draw breath, this station still has hope, we must continue the fight, no matter the cost
[life support goes online]

> 
> Let me go with you! I know a way around this ship, and I have a few tools that may be useful.

Xannari, I am not even sure if I can even trust you. you have stabbed almost each one of us in the back at one point or another.

> 
> Negative, Not while I still draw breath, this station still has hope, we must continue the fight, no matter the cost

Alright, but you *have* to see the Multiverse at some point.

Alert, we have another fleet incoming.

Who is sending these fleets?

Oh no. Computer, download status.

Ã¢â‚¬â€¹73% complete

> 
> Xannari, I am not even sure if I can even trust you. you have stabbed almost each one of us in the back at one point or another.

Except for me! Haha

> 
> Xannari, I am not even sure if I can even trust you. you have stabbed almost each one of us in the back at one point or another.

[Are you crazy?]
Alright, Xannari, can you stop their downloads?

I'm going to detonate an EMP to kill the AI. It'll wipe our computers though.

3

2

1

\*fizzle\*

> 
> Alright, Xannari, can you stop their downloads?

I'm an engineer, sir. Not a hacker.

All lights are out

Computers are offline

[Ha ha, stopped your download]
It'll take some time to get those computer's back online, but still, the original mission must continue, we MUST get the life support back online...

ALERT: Enemy destroyer incoming, powered down, velocity 10.4 Km/sec

An enemy ship is gonna crash into us!

[Meanwhile, on the vessel]

Storage download terminated. Beginning raw bit extraction... Download 83% complete.
